body:
I did one of these as a video, but this time I will reply to everyone in the comments of this thread!

So Ask Me Anything . . .
body_tagged:
I did one of these as a video, but this time I will reply to everyone in the comments of this thread!

So Ask Me Anything . . .
title: AMA - Following the recent trend!

replies.body: Woohoo AMAs! What are your hobbies? Any favourite TV shows/movies? Favourite pony?
replies.body_tagged: Woohoo AMAs! What are your hobbies? Any favourite TV shows/movies? Favourite pony?

replies.body:
In your opinion, what would be on the perfect pizza?
What's your favorite movie?
Are you afraid of anything/have any phobias?
replies.body_tagged:
In your opinion, what would be on the perfect pizza?
What's your favorite movie?
Are you afraid of anything/have any phobias?

replies.body:
@Howsie22
Playing video games, designing, making Youtube videos
Modern Family
Don't have one

replies.body:
@bpirr
Cheese and Garlic, so a Garlic Pizza, I know I am crazy
I have a lot so I can't name any in particular
I am afraid of the dark, I know it sounds pathetic!

replies.body: 32nd AMA in the recent trend so far >.<

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure I started it :/

On-topic: What motivated you to start a channel? What mic/editing software do you use?
replies.body_tagged:
I'm pretty sure I started it :/

On-topic: What motivated you to start a channel? What mic/editing software do you use?

replies.body:
@JKawesome
I was motivated by watching other Youtubers and my friends!
I use Audacity to record commentaries, and Camtasia to record live stuff and edit! My mic is the Blue Yeti.
